blogs.title: My first thought in the morning.
blogs.author: Jay
blogs.content: Ive always wanted to work on this. A place where id send you blogs which arent really blogs but a read at anytime love letter. Whatever i was creating s halfway done but i think you can atleast read what i have. This is Saturday the 29th of April 2023. Weve just met after a really long while cant exactly remember how long. Anyway today was amazing. I saw you. Thats the biggest thing. Then i spent some time with you. Hata kama ulikua unataka kuKIMBIA kwa mvua ndo ULALE😂😂 Anyways i had so much fun to see you and leaving i was like hii sunday inafika lini nikuone tena. Anyway dont know if youd love this or not but id always try to put a smile on your face.

blogs.title: Sundays. Weddings, food and Kianni
blogs.author: Jay
blogs.content: So its sunday. Day two of this trial and error blog or love letter. We were at church literally the whole day. Mostly juu ya chakula but yes. And the fact that i spent it with you just makes it even more exciting. Even though tulimiss kids concert na hukuona baby wako(Natasha) uliona baby wako mwingine(J😂😂)Anyway, I had fun. A lot of fun. From the pictures..either we look too fine or we look too fine. Siri sio iPhone😂😂Anyway i had fun. I was a bit nervous at the start but things just got better. And when you told me what Harim told you if i was white id be flushed in pink. Thank God🛐😂 And when the day kept moving to the end i just didnt want it to but imeisha and thats the least favorite thing about this. Before i end this one. If I was Mwaniki and you my Didi. Id beg for a sleepover. Just to sleep with you. Its like the most romantic thing i can think of. Just laying there on each other. Just being with the one you love. Whod not want that. If i can dream of something. After having you let that be my second wish. Anyways. Im still around. Your still around. Well have more of such days. And probably even better.

blogs.title: Ecstacy. Happiness. Joy. All in one
blogs.author: Jay
blogs.content: So this was supposed to be a surprise on Sunday. Various issues came up but i'm finally here. Now your eagerly waiting for whatever im supposed to tell you. Its nothing much honestly. Its just this🥲😅I felt like making a blog section. Where it'd be like a love letter but in blogs. I'm just completing this and i'm happy.Today i wanted to tell you how happy you make me. I was listening to overdose nikipika in the dark😭😂😂these KPLC guys🥹And that song has something about it with you. I keep remembering the video you danced it and id always associate you with the song🥹And the same thing happens with you and my happiness. The way you make me happy is unrivaled😊😊And the fact that you do it so effortlessly makes me even happier🤭🤭And id love to keep you forever. And hey. I've pushed you too much and too quick most times and i know that. But I hope and want to be slower this time. So yes i'm being 1000% romantic at this moment but I'm being slow and not rushing things cause I want you now and forever😌😊So I'll be patient😊 Love Jay🤭❤️😊 PS the create feature is still in production😅😂Ill tell you when its ready till then its just me
